## Packages
```{r}
library(reshape2)
library(dplyr)
library(gsubfn)
library(stringr)
```


## Converting raw data F02
```{r}
F02_raw <- read.table("F02_raw.csv", sep = ",", na.strings = c("", "NA")) #read in data
F02 <- F02_raw[,-c(2:5)] #cut out unnecessary columns
F02 <- F02[,-c(4:8)] #cut out unnecessary columns
names(F02) <- c("Sample_ID", "Marker", "Allele") #rename columns
F02 = F02 %>% na.omit() #omit all NAs
F02[F02 == "Sample"] <- NA #convert sample to NAs so they can be omitted
F02 = F02 %>% na.omit() #omit NAs again
F02$Sample_ID <- str_sub(F02$Sample, 5, 18) #Remove lane name and underscore
F02 <- F02[order(F02$Sample_ID),]
View(F02)
```

## Format data for merge
```{r}
F02_merge <- F02[,-c(2)] 
names(F02_merge) <- c("Sample_ID", "F02")
write.table(F02_merge, "F02_final.csv", sep = ",", row.names = F)

F10_merge <- F10[,-c(2)] 
names(F10_merge) <- c("Sample_ID", "F10")
write.table(F10_merge, "F10_final.csv", sep = ",", row.names = F)

F17_merge <- F17[,-c(2)] 
names(F17_merge) <- c("Sample_ID", "F17")

F82_merge <- F82[,-c(2)]

F87_merge <- F87[,-c(2)]

```
